laserschein
Class OptimizerSettings

java.lang.Object
  laserschein.OptimizerSettings

public class OptimizerSettings
extends java.lang.Object

Settings for turning graphics into sample points. This will likely be different for every laser system.

Author:
allesblinkt

public int maxTravel
The maximum distance between individual points. If a distance is smaller than this, it will be subdivided.
